# Daniel David Calderón Tinjaca — Portfolio

> Junior Frontend Web Developer from Villeta, Cundinamarca, Colombia.

## About

Daniel David Calderón Tinjaca is a junior frontend web developer specializing in Angular
and modern web technologies. Passionate about creating attractive, responsive, and
accessible web experiences.

## Contact

- Email: calderondanieldavid@gmail.com
- GitHub: https://github.com/DanielDCT
- LinkedIn: https://linkedin.com/in/daniel-calderon-tinjaca
- Twitter: https://twitter.com/danieldacati1
- Location: Villeta, Cundinamarca, Colombia

## Skills

- Frameworks: Angular, Bootstrap
- Languages: TypeScript, JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, PHP
- Tools: Git, MySQL
- Practices: Responsive Design, SEO Optimization

## Services

- Development of modern and visually attractive websites
- Responsive design for all devices
- SEO optimization for better visibility

## Projects (19 personal projects)

- Portafolio — Personal portfolio built with Angular, TypeScript, HTML5, CSS
- PokeApi — Pokemon API explorer with Angular
- Iron Core — Personal training services website (Angular)
- Panadela — Cappuccino promotion website (Angular)
- Opticalia — E-commerce website for glasses (HTML/CSS/JS)
- Traveling — Flight promotion website (HTML/CSS/JS)
- Login & Signup PHP — Functional login system (PHP, MySQL)
- BMI Calculator — Body Mass Index tool (HTML/CSS/JS)
- And 11 more projects available on the portfolio.

## Languages

This portfolio is available in Spanish (ES) and English (EN).
